title: High End Bike Shop trashes a Parlee Z5 frame by using Epoxy to fix a creaky bottom bracket
content: A high end bike shop in London decided it would be a good idea to fix a customer’s Parlee Z5 bike frame by using Epoxy to glue some Campagnolo bottom bracket cups in to the bike frame. What followed was a customer who was repeatedly going through bottom bracket cups – often in the space […]
